avalancheActivity.highlights: The weather conditions will facilitate a strengthening of the snowpack.
avalancheActivity.comment:
As the temperature drops there will be a decrease in the avalanche danger. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. In addition the wind slabs must be taken into account.
The avalanches can be released by large loads.
In many places there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

snowpackStructure.comment: The exceptional weather conditions gave rise to consolidation of the snowpack. The surface of the snowpack will freeze to form a strong crust. Weak layers exist in the snowpack.

tendency.highlights:
Over a wide area moderate wind. The weather will be cold.
As a consequence of falling temperatures, the avalanche activity will gradually decrease.
